issues.description: The template for fix_vec_sub.asm declares the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm as global (exported), but the solution version declares it as extern (imported). This symbol visibility mismatch between template and solution could confuse students about how to correctly export their implementation and may break the expected linking behavior.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the “extern fix_vec_sub_asm” directive with “global fix_vec_sub_asm” in the .data section to match the template and ensure the function symbol is properly exported.
